package step3;
import step1.Date;
public class Course {
    private int code; //课程编号
    private String courseName; //课程名称
    private Date testTime;//考试日期
    private int score;//考试成绩
   /******Begin**************/

    public Course() {
		this.courseName="";
		this.testTime = new Date();
	}
    
    public Course(int code, String name,int year,int month,int day ,int score) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    	this.code = code;
    	this.courseName = name;
    	this.score = score;
    	this.testTime = new Date(year,month,day);
	}
    
    public Course(int code, String name,Date d ,int score) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
    	this.code = code;
    	this.courseName = name;
    	this.score = score;
    	this.testTime = d;
	}
    
    public String toString(){
		return this.code+" "+this.courseName+" "+this.testTime+" "+this.score;
    }


   /******End************/

}
